jobDescription: Location: Primarily remote. However, must be able to work onsite for initial training in Troy, MI (48083).  Maintains the General Motors Corporate Supplier Identification Source (CSIDS). This Database is set up to track all activity and supplier information globally. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES PROCESS CUSTOMER REQUESTS by reviewing data for deficiencies; resolving discrepancies by using standard procedures or returning inaccurate documents to the supervisor for resolution.  VERIFIES INFORMATION by searching Dun & Bradstreet databases using established search criteria; identifying appropriate Duns for legal company name and address.  PRODUCES INFORMATION by initiating telecommunications to verify supplier data if not identifiable in D & B.  PREPARES SOURCE DATA FOR COMPUTER ENTRY by compiling and sorting information; establishing entry priorities.  ENTERS SOURCE DATA by inputting alphabetic and numeric information according to CSIDS screen format and customer policies.  MAINTAINS HISTORICAL RECORDS by documenting system changes and revisions and storing documentation for a three month period.  REQUESTS INFORMATION AND UPDATES by contacting D & B via electronic mail; initiating investigation to update or establish supplier records.  ENSURES CUSTOMER AND USER SATISFACTION by resolving open issues by providing instructional information as requested.  MAINTAINS OPERATIONS by following policies and procedures; reporting needed changes.  CONTRIBUTES TO TEAM EFFORT by accomplishing related results as needed.  PREPARES ALL DESIGNATED CDI AND CUSTOMER PERSONNEL TO USE THE SYSTEM by conducting training sessions.  MAINTAINS PROFESSIONAL AND TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE by attending educational workshops.  DISCLAIMER: The above essential functions are a summarized list. It is not intended to be a complete list of all the duties and responsibilities. PERFORMANCE CRITERIA Demonstrates Leadership  Influences others by example  Meets goals and objectives  Maintains positive relationships  Acts with Integrity  Sound business ethics are consistent  Follows through on commitments  Honest and fair with all  Manages Execution  Establishes priorities for his/her work  Manages time well  Handles paperwork effectively  Achieves Results  Action-oriented  Doesn't wait to be told to take action  Persists despite obstacles and opposition  Shows Work Commitment  Steps up to responsibilities  Sets high standards of performance  Champion of corporate values  Team Player  Supports team goals  Helps others  Focuses on team success  Demonstrates Adaptability  Handles day-to-day work challenges confidently  Willing and able to adjust to multiple demands, shifting priorities, ambiguity and rapid change  Shows resilience in the face of frustration or adversity  Communicates Effectively  Speaks in a clear, articulate and concise manner  Pays attention when others are speaking  Checks and validates for understanding  Quality-Focused  Demonstrates commitment to quality  Supports QBS initiatives  Adds value to the organization JOB QUALIFICATIONS Personal Characteristics Aligned with Performance Criteria  Demonstrates leadership  Acts with integrity  Manages execution  Achieves results  Shows work commitment  Team player  Demonstrates adaptability  Communicates effectively  Quality-focused  Job-Related Knowledge, Skills, Abilities  Knowledge of corporate policies  Computer skills in Windows XP of Higher  Ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously  Organization and time management skills  Ability to use analytical thought process  Active listening skills Education High school diploma required; Associates Degree or applicable professional experience preferred  Job-Related Experience  Background in an office environment with strong telecommunication skills  Order Desk/Help Desk background preferred
